SESSION_ID.description: Paste here session id that you have scanned

MODE.description: Enter true for public. no for private

AUTO_STATUS_SEEN.description: Enter true for autoview status. no for no

AUTO_READ.description: Enter true for autoread messages. no for no

AUTO_TYPING.description: Enter true for autotype. no for no

AUTO_RECORDING.description: Enter true if you want bot to show recording audio

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: Enter it true if you want bot to show always online

AUTO_BLOCK.description: Enter it true if you want bot to auto block only 212 numbers

REJECT_CALL.description: Enter it true if you want to reject call
